price: Dijeron: "Vayamos temprano a nuestro campo si queremos recoger la cosecha".
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ
footnotes: Para que los pobres no se den cuenta y no les reclamen caridad.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
